channel.title: Wairua (Mts)
channel.desc: The topic of wairua will be covered and the question will be answered from a M?ori perspective of ancient times, through to the present. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Karanga The First Voice
channel.desc: Iwi around the motu explore and celebrate karanga in contemporary Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whaik?rero
channel.desc: Whaik?rero masters and practioners examine formal oral traditions from Te Wh?nau-a-Apanui, Te Whakat?hea, Ng?i Te Rangi and scrutinise the evolution of this art form in a contemporary world. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Kaaterama Pou as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Dive into the spoken word poetry world with Stevie Davis-Tana. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: Shedding light on the lives of the homeless and impoverished in Aotearoa New Zealand. Six meets Danille, the founder of Sunday Blessings. (R).

channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: Shedding light on the lives of the homeless and impoverished in Aotearoa New Zealand. Six visits two Auckland City Mission housing initiatives. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Aroha Nui Say I Do
channel.desc: The extraordinary lives of M?ori wedding celebrants. ?p?tiki celebrant, Annette Papuni Mcllenan, goes back in time to her own wedding venue to marry a couple whose wedding ends with a bang. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hur? P?pi
channel.desc: Develops the skills of new mums and dads raising their babies in the M?ori language. (R).

channel.title: Bend it like Beckham

channel.title: Tagata Pasifika 2025

channel.title: Fresh 2025

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The World?s Most Amazing Festivals

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sachies Kitchen
channel.desc: NEW: Chef Sachie Nomura is in MacKenzie Country visiting High Country Salmon with comedian great Lynda Topp and she goes star gazing with Ng?i Tahu Dark Sky Project.

channel.title: Bend it like Beckham
channel.desc: A young British-Indian girl defies her traditional family to pursue her dream of playing soccer professionally.

channel.title: Bamay
channel.desc: NEW: A showcase of Australia?s most diverse and stunning landscapes, shot from the air and inspired by the word Bamay, which means land in the Bundjalung language from northern New South Wales.

channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Meet some of the living legends of Aotearoa, the M?ori leaders who were raised through the challenging years where te reo M?ori was shunned. (R).

channel.title: Nurturing Hope
channel.desc: NEW: A heart-warming factual reality tv series that follows Kaikohe mother, first language speaker Clara Aperahama Kopa and the journey to improve the life of her severely disabled son, Mungzy.

channel.title: Foreign Correspondent - I Can't Breath
channel.desc: Guest reporter Stan Grant gives voice to the frustration and hurt that has defined the life experience of so many indigenous Australians and why the death of George Floyd resonates so profoundly. (R).

channel.title: Someday Stories 6 2022
channel.desc: A young M?ori boy joins his rugged dad on his night shift recycling truck job, his dad spends the journey trying to impress upon him the importance of not losing his reo. (R).

channel.title: Official Competition
channel.desc: A wealthy businessman hires a famous filmmaker to help make a smash hit film. (R).
